mapper.insert:
insert into test_quotation (id, client, quotation_num, attn, tel_client, tel_com, fax_client, fax_com, email, gmt_create, invoice_title, report_type, delivery_address, test_peroid, bank_account_name, bank_account, bank_name, client_com_signature, libiao_representative_signature, client_com_chop, audit, client_signature_date, libiao_signature_date, employee, customer, remark, test_trade_id, from_com, report_fee, courier_fee, tax_fee, discount, total_cost, service_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{client,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faxClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faxCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testPeroid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientComSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{libiaoRepresentativeSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientComChop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientSignatureDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{libiaoSignatureDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{testTradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fromCom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportFee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courierFee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxFee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalCost, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceId, jdbcType=BIGINT} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update test_quotation set client = #{client,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quotation_num = #{quotationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attn = #{attn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel_client = #{telClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel_com = #{telCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax_client = #{faxClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax_com = #{faxCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invoice_title = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_type = #{reportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_address = #{deliveryAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_peroid = #{testPeroid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_account_name = #{bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_com_signature = #{clientComSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, libiao_representative_signature = #{libiaoRepresentativeSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_com_chop = #{clientComChop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit = #{audit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_signature_date = #{clientSignatureDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, libiao_signature_date = #{libiaoSignatureDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee = #{employee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer = #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, test_trade_id = #{testTradeId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, from_com = #{fromCom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_fee = #{reportFee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, courier_fee = #{courierFee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_fee = #{taxFee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount = #{discount, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_cost = #{totalCost, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_id = #{serviceId, jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, client, quotation_num, attn, tel_client, tel_com, fax_client, fax_com, email, gmt_create, invoice_title, report_type, delivery_address, test_peroid, bank_account_name, bank_account, bank_name, client_com_signature, libiao_representative_signature, client_com_chop, audit, client_signature_date, libiao_signature_date, employee, customer, remark, test_trade_id, from_com, report_fee, courier_fee, tax_fee, discount, total_cost, service_id from test_quotation where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, client, quotation_num, attn, tel_client, tel_com, fax_client, fax_com, email, gmt_create, invoice_title, report_type, delivery_address, test_peroid, bank_account_name, bank_account, bank_name, client_com_signature, libiao_representative_signature, client_com_chop, audit, client_signature_date, libiao_signature_date, employee, customer, remark, test_trade_id, from_com, report_fee, courier_fee, tax_fee, discount, total_cost, service_id from test_quotation

select id, client, quotation_num, attn, tel_client, tel_com, fax_client, fax_com, email, gmt_create, invoice_title, report_type, delivery_address, test_peroid, bank_account_name, bank_account, bank_name, client_com_signature, libiao_representative_signature, client_com_chop, audit, client_signature_date, libiao_signature_date, employee, customer, remark, test_trade_id, from_com, report_fee, courier_fee, tax_fee, discount, total_cost, service_id from test_quotation where employee = #{employee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, client, quotation_num, attn, tel_client, tel_com, fax_client, fax_com, email, gmt_create, invoice_title, report_type, delivery_address, test_peroid, bank_account_name, bank_account, bank_name, client_com_signature, libiao_representative_signature, client_com_chop, audit, client_signature_date, libiao_signature_date, employee, customer, remark, test_trade_id, from_com, report_fee, courier_fee, tax_fee, discount, total_cost, service_id from test_quotation where test_trade_id = #{testTradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select a.* from test_quotation a left join user_test_trade b on a.test_trade_id = b.test_trade_id left join user c on b.user_id = c.id where c.username = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
